name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eesel AI: ChatGPT Sidebar for AI in Google Docs, Zendesk & more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make AI bots that know your docs (like Google Docs, Confluence, Notion) and assist in your helpdesk (like Zendesk, Freshdesk).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the eesel AI Chrome extension, you can make AI bots that know your company knowledge and can instantly answer any question from the sidebar. Perfect for support and sales. 

📚 Teach the AI bots any docs: 
Open your Google Docs, Notion pages, Confluence pages, help articles, or any other web page, and add it as a “Source” for your bot to learn from. It only takes a click.

🤖 Helpdesk AI assistant: 
Make all your support agents top performers with an AI agent assistant. It works with Gorgias, Zendesk, Freshdesk, Intercom or any other helpdesk and can draft replies for a particular ticket.

💬 Chat with the AI bots anywhere in Chrome: 
AI save you hours by drafting emails, Google Docs, support replies and more for you.

🔒 Safe and secure
- OpenAI does not use data submitted via API to train OpenAI models.
- All data is stored securely and are private by default.
- Learn more about privacy here: https://eesel.ai

➜ Help and suggestions:
- Visit our website for more info: https://eesel.ai
- Check our help center: https://intercom.help/eesel/
